name: Business development manager
description:
Reikartz Hotel Group, an international hotel chain in the hospitality industry, operating under the leading European standards of guest service, announces an open search for the position of Business Development Manager.

Requirements:

- Experience in partnership building, investment management, crisis management;

- Willingness to explain business development proposals;

- Willingness keep a balance and pay equal attention to short and long term - strategic goals of the company;

- Mind flexibility;

- 3 years or more experience in hospitality industry.

- Languages: Serbian or Bulgarian - professional, English - conversational.

Duties:

- Analyzing the hotel services market and competitive environment;

- Creation of short-term and long-term forecasts;

- Development of measures for the implementation of strategies for long-term stable development of the company in the market;

- Building and developing effective communications with key market players, negotiating commercial terms for business partners;

- Building effective business processes to ensure the smooth operation of the company in the country;

- Searching for potentially interesting properties (hotels) to be managed according to the Company's approved criteria;

- Reporting the results of audits;

- Assisting in opening of properties;

- Maintaining partnerships.

Terms:

- The opportunity to realize your potential in a major international company;

- Work on ambitious, large-scale projects with a well-known brand;

- Decent wages and bonuses;

- Availability of business travel more than 50% of the working time;

- Social package.
